title: Don't Fuel The Fire | Joel Osteen
itunes:title: Don't Fuel The Fire | Joel Osteen
description:
If we’re not careful, it can be easy to get pulled into talking negatively about others. But when you protect someone’s reputation, you are sowing seeds for your time of need. Choose to show love and mercy, and you'll see God fill your life with His favor.

Your best days are still ahead, and together we can make a difference in this world with the message of God's hope and love.

To give visit JoelOsteen.com/GiveHope

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
